external_references.description: GReAT. (2021, June 16). Ferocious Kitten: 6 Years of Covert Surveillance in Iran. Retrieved September 22, 2021.

description: [Ferocious Kitten](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0137) has used right-to-left override to reverse executables’ names to make them appear to have different file extensions, rather than their real ones.(Citation: Kaspersky Ferocious Kitten Jun 2021)
